feature: Dual-speed lightweight spin brush suitable for all skin types, including the most sensitive
Gently but thoroughly removes hard-to-get dirt, makeup, and debris
Water-resistant for use in the shower. Do not submerge in water
Dual-speed lightweight spin brush suitable for all skin types, including the most sensitive
Gently but thoroughly removes hard-to-get dirt, makeup, and debris
Water-resistant for use in the shower. Do not submerge in water
Skin is left clean, smooth, and ready to absorb masks, serums, and moisturizers
3 interchangeable brush heads are included: Daily Cleansing, Exfoliating to be used once a week, and Silicone for sensitive skin, plus hard protective case for storage and travel
Cordless; Operates on 2 AA batteries (not included)
Available in Bombshell Blue, Pucker-up Pink, and Not Your Mother’s Purple
description: The first time you wash your face with the Vanity Planet Ultimate Skin Spa Facial Cleansing Brush will feel like the first time you’ve ever truly washed your face! OK, so maybe that’s a slight exagger ...
